short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application provides word count for any specific page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The words is a very useful chrome extension to enhance your productivity.
You can use this chrome extension to find the number of words, characters etc on any webpage.
This chrome extension is designed for every single internet user who wants most out of his time.
